: : Rodimus Prime/Lord Elder : :

Rodimus Prime: Agreed.

Rodimus figures out a comm panel on the wall and
contacts Lord Elder.

Rodimus Prime: Lord Elder, this is Rodimus Prime. I
know you are busy and that we are supposed to meet
soon, but my wife and I need to leave for a short
while. We would like to search for our daughter. We
would return then.

Elder switches his comm channel over.

Lord Elder: I understand. Thank you for informing me.

Elder switches back to Deadfur.

Rodimus looks at Nightlight.

Rodimus Prime: Let's go.

Rodimus locates an exit through the computer and heads
outside. He transformes to vehical mode and rolls for
the crash site.

--- Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:

> 
> Nighlgiht:
> 
> The femme was slighty surpriced, he never had
> speaken in thay way. but she didn't say anything
> about and sighed "Then we must request prtmition to
> search our daughter..."

> 
> 
>   : : Rodimus Prime : :
>   Rodimus observed his wife, taking in what she had
> said.
> 
>   Rodimus Prime: I think they can be trusted. They
> seem dedicated to the more important things: Unicron
> and his Minions. They arn't about our petty wars
> that have waged for millions of years. Day in, day
> out. Bash this Decepticon, bash that Predacon. It
> could be nice to get out of it for a while. As for
> Elita, we'll have to hurry. Chances are that a
> Maximal group located her signature.
>
